help-file.title: "SONG OF SLEEP"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Enchantment
A successful verse of this song will cause those in the room and ungrouped to fall magically asleep. A victim affected by this song cannot awaken on their own; it takes another to wake him/her.
